To reproduce: Create Class using New->Other, java->Java Class

getShell failes when accessed in the page's createControl
(-> NPE as the container has not been set)
however, JavaDoc of getShell comment mention
 * The advantage of this implementation is that the shell is accessable
 * once the container is created even though this page's control may not 
 * yet be created.

changed to classwizard to not access getShell in createContents anymore

Should the container be set earlier?
Please investigate, and update Javadoc if needed.
Fixed in WizardDialog.setWizard to set the container ealier.
